no_types: There are no team types defined yet
no_teams: There are no teams defined yet

min_age.label: Min. Age
min_age.placeholder: The minimum age of a member to be part of this team.

max_age.label: Max. Age
max_age.placeholder: The maximum age of a member to be part of this team.

gender.label: Gender
gender.placeholder: Will the team be restricted to a specific gender?

name.label: Name
name.placeholder: Enter the name of the team

season.label: Season
season.hint: A team that is not related to a season can be used to group members (to register the presence on a training for example). A team that is related to a season can be used for tournaments/games.

team_type.label: Teamtype
team_type.hint: A type can be used to add more checks when a member is added to the team (Age for example).

age_remark: Age is determined on the end date of the season {season} ({start} – {end})
sure_to_delete: Are you sure to remove these members from this team?
name: Name
add_members_info: Members are automatically selected based on the team type.
not_allowed: You're not allowed to this information.
